Articles.Content:
Here at Proto Planes Inc. we make custom planes for the crazy kerbals wanting to fly and blow things up in a whole new way. with awesome planes (or at least i hope there awesome ).

Most of our planes will be made with designs that are not as common as most and hopefully unique ideas (hard to really know saying all the old threads were lost ). I will always want to hear ideas or see pictures of planes that are cool or you just want me to attempt to make (this is not me saying i will just me saying i will give it a look).

right now i am looking for test pilots to tell me more stats (like the range and other crazy things you guys may think of).

Now to the planes.

Now a plane made by Spartwo. The Ion Drone is a ion powered plane, yes thats right eco friendly plane capable of going very far.weighing in a only 2 tons.here you go try it out and have fun with a new ion plane at your disposal.

Get it from our Green isle

Here is the KA7-Bat Proto. A medium altitude plane with Large amount of thrust and a slick design. Outfitted with 4 turbo jets and extremely controllable. Not much more to say other than its a fun plane to fly hope you like it.

Get it at Super planes emporium

Here is the new KV37 A-Eagle VTOL Proto. It uses 4 VTOL jet engines to land and take off but can fly with the 3 on the back. It is easy to fly and looks really cool. Plus if your poor kerbals are stranded just pop them in the extra 2 cabins located on both wings. As always with the planes here it is well balanced.

Has 4 big landing gear to land on

Get it form on top of your roof

form our secret development facility located in a secret location is the K9 Bomber series.

the first one in the series is the wait for it wait for it the the K9 A-Bomber Proto

equiped with 6 bombs and belly armor to protect form pesky rockets. This stealth bomber will destroy any target and then fly away with its 4 turbo jet engines. This Stealth bomber only has 290 parts (fully equipped with all its bombs). This is a must have for any crazy kerbals who need to destroy there enemies and get away with it.

Get it at :Kerbmart

A variant of the K9 A-Bomber proto the K9 B- Bomber proto

created in result to a kerbal jumping on one of the bombs. when it went BOOM he went flying and all the kebals had to find him. they happened to have a K9 laying around and took off the bombs and armor and strapped sum big fancy lights on it and went searching. (he was never found rumor says he started a 2nd kerbal space program but thats just rumors or is it). After further development they changed to a hybrid engine cluster and gave it a new original name. (after taking all the bombs and stuff off it only has 248 parts)

Get it at :Planes R Us

This next plane is a downsized K9 bomber outfitted with a jumbo bomb and advanced armor on it's belly.The new K3 C-Low A Bomber Proto uses state of the art low Alt. engines (2) to fly around with extreme agility.It has exactly 100 parts (all by accident). Get the new lighter stealth bomber today

Get it at : Planes R Us

All these planes so far are very stable with and without payload and are easy for beginners (recomend staying below 20,000 feet when using)

More planes will be added frequently (hopefully one or 2 a day) so keep your eyes open.

Edited July 15, 2013 by brobel

How does the K9 A & B fly cause 248 parts without the weapons is a Huge amount of parts?

The thing looks awesome keep up the good work!

it flys well until you get above 20,000 then it starts to loose control wich is completly from the wings no rcs our anything (has tones of air intakes that would allow for realy high flight like 14 or somthing) but when just flying its real easy minor trim adjustments and it will stay level.

Also there is a lot of control surfaces

I made an aircraft similar to this design a few days ago but had troubles keeping it flying strait when it got up to speed...

I like this.. very good.
yea i have upright wings hidden in the plane along with air intakes and struts (upright wings keep the plane going the direction of the nose)
Here is my one so you can compare.. It isn't as nice as yours and has some parts missing due to me trying to trouble shoot it's habit to fly sideways when going fast... xD
yea but to get the look of having no upright wings you put them on the lowest wing and face them up
Hey this is me asking for Any Good builders or people with good ideas for cool planes

I215 sunlight

run at 2/3 throttle at midday.over 3 hours of runtime and a top speed of 58m/s unassisted.small 2 ton ion drone currently on eve.extremely nimble and responsive.capable of long distances

download:http://www./download/2xa17kxa7ppw77e/ion_drone.craft

1000 km combat range

high lift
Why has no one mentioned this should be in a place called Rocket Builders?

Because he is one guy and therefore not an entire company. Same reason my craft thread is not in rocket builders.

I now have to do my own flying wing since that looks so awesome.
Hey is this company still active? Im thinking of making this the designated "Zokesia Skunkworks" Aircraft Company. Would you guys like that?
